name: Escape City (itch)
description:
You Have To Collect All balloons to win the game and escape after you stole a random girl's mobile phone

Avoid being caught more than 3 times or you will lose!

Controls:

  Press "Left Mouse Button" to make the player run and move it around him for rotating

  To Attack Enemy press the "Right Mouse Button"
